quote.text: Reality is that which, when you stop believing in it, doesn't go away
quote.author: Philip K. Dick

quote.text: Any sufficiently advanced bug is indistinguishable from a feature
quote.author: Rich Kulawiec

quote.text: Never put off till run-time what you can do at compile-time
quote.author: D. Gries

quote.text: Experience is a good teacher, but she sends in terrific bills
quote.author: Minna Antrim

quote.text: If a listener nods his head when you're explaining your program, wake him up
quote.author: Alan Perlis
